name: State plant
text:
Kalo (Colocasia esculenta (L.) Schott), the Hawaiian word for taro, is adopted, established, and designated as the official plant of the State. [L 2007, c 36, §2; am L 2008, c 71, §1]
 
Note
 
  Taro security and purity task force (reports to legislature through 2010).  L 2008, c 211.
